summary: This is a brief email forwarding a 'Monthly Unit Update Report' from an Associate U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a recipient. The document is part of the Epstein case files and appears to be routine administrative correspondence.

persons.name: Associate U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Sender of the Monthly Unit Update Report
persons.context: The person who sent the original 'Monthly Unit Update Report' email on February 3, 2019, from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Monthly Unit Update Report Sent
events.description: An Associate U.S. Attorney sent a 'Monthly Unit Update Report' via email.

events.title: Report Forwarded
events.description: The 'Monthly Unit Update Report' email was forwarded to another recipient.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 4, 2019, forwarding a 'Monthly Unit Update Report'.
The original report was sent by an Associate U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York on February 3, 2019.
The correspondence is routine administrative communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office involved in the Epstein case.
